title: Microservices with spring boot and spring cloud
content:
# [Microservices with spring boot and spring cloud](https://boosthub.io/)

Advantages of Microservices
- Easer adapting of new technologies to each microservice [writve in new lang]
- Dynamic scaling
- Faster release cycle [faster giving value] faster bring new features

Challanges related wtih Microserviceses
- Logging proccess along all microservices [solutin using prefix with service and uuid]
- Configuration on all env for all services [solution spirng cloud config server with centalized configuration]

Configuation
- Service which use it should have config client dependency
- configuration is done in .properties files
- Good practice is to create Bean with configuration which takes values from .properties just use @ConfigurationProperties("limits-service") [in string pass propreties prefix to filter what we have]
